item.title: Feeling Stuck
item.author: Author
item.description: I stepped away from learning korean for the last 6 to 8 weeks. Life got busy, so I stopped doing my daily flashcards and meeting with my online tutor. I know I have to get back to it, but I just don’t want to. I’m sure I’ve gotten a bunch of material and the thought of returning to my Korean text book just feels so boring. The truth is that I haven’t been having much fun lately.
